Url::base.description: Returns the base URL of the current request.

Url::canonical.description: Returns the canonical URL of the currently requested page.

Url::current.description: Creates a URL by using the current route and the GET parameters.

Url::isRelative.description: Returns a value indicating whether a URL is relative.

Url::normalizeRoute.description: Normalizes route and makes it suitable for UrlManager. Absolute routes are staying as is while relative routes are converted to absolute ones.

Url::remember.description: Remembers the specified URL so that it can be later fetched back by previous().

Url::to.description: Creates a URL based on the given parameters.

Url::toRoute.description: Creates a URL for the given route.
